name: Motobug the Badnik in Sonic The Hedgehog
overview: Motobug the Badnik in Sonic The Hedgehog (aka Motobug in Sonic 1) is a hack of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Mega Drive, by Polygon Jim. As its title suggests, in this hack the main character Sonic the Hedgehog is replaced by Motobug, one of Dr. Robotnik's Badniks.
